title: Time Counter 1000+
body:
Hi,

I have a problem with my League of Legends client and was wondering if anyone knew the fix for it, as it really is annoying. When i look at the time counter for my friends games, they always show up with absurdly large numbers (1000+ minutes of game time.) This is similar for the featured games of the day, displayed in the bottom right hand corner of the main window. When in a game (playing or spectating) the time counter displays the correct time.

Cheers.

replies.body: Just wondering if you ever found a fix. I'm having the same issue.

My apologies,

Yes i did find a fix for this issue (although through extensive trial and error). Basically, look in the time and date section of your PC and ensure that the time zone is set correctly. Mine was set to an American time zone, but I had edited the time to the correct Australian time. This meant that my game, thinking it was american from my online time, saw everyone else in the same area as me approximately 10 hours ahead of me.

Hope this makes sense (I tend to ramble)
How it works out for you.
Scobster007 (l Torchic l)
This ended up being my problem as well. My computer was somehow set 24 hours ahead without my knowing. Changed it to the correct time and that fixed the issue! Thanks!!
